value.headline: FY25 Organic Net Sales Decline

value.headline: Sale of Imperial Blue Business Division
value.summary: Pernod Ricard India is selling its Imperial Blue business to Tilaknagar Industries to focus on premium brands.

value.headline: Volume Recovery in Key Markets
value.summary: Pernod Ricard experienced a volume recovery of +2% with three consecutive semesters of growth.

value.headline: Challenging Macro-Economic Environment
